metadata.title: CVE-2012-5572 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
CRLF injection vulnerability in the cookie method (lib/Dancer/Cookie.pm) inDancer before 1.3114 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary HTTPheaders and conduct HTTP response splitting attacks via a cookie name, adifferent vulnerability than CVE-2012-5526.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-5572` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libdancer-perl - 1.3114+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libdancer-perl package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.3114+dfsg-1').
